name: Way to Enlightenment Tour
destination: Bodhgaya - Patna - Kushinagar - Lumbini - Sravasti - Varanasi

sketchProgram.title: Bodhgaya
sketchProgram.desc: Arrive Bodhgaya & transfer to Hotel. Overnight at Hotel in Bodhgaya.

sketchProgram.title: Bodhgaya / Patna (190 kms)
sketchProgram.desc: Breakfast at hotel. Proceed to Rajgir and Nalanda (80 kms, 4hrs drive). After sightseeing of Rajgir and Nalanda proceed to Patna (90 kms, 3Â½ hr drive). On Arrival at Patna transfer to Hotel. Overnight at Hotel in Patna.

sketchProgram.title: Patna / Kushinagar (via Vaishali, approx. 350 kms, 8 hrs drive)
sketchProgram.desc:
After breakfast proceed to Kushinagar enroute visit Vaishali. On arrival transfer to Hotel. Overnight at Hotel in Kushinagar.
Kushinagar - The place where Buddha entered perfect tranquillity the state of MahaPariNirvana.

sketchProgram.title: Kushinagar / Lumbini (in Nepal, approx. 170 kms, 4 hrs. drive)
sketchProgram.desc:
After breakfast proceed to Lumbini (situated in Nepal, 25 kms from India Border). After clearing Immigration & Custom Formalities visit Lubini for sightseeing, transfer to Hotel. Overnight at Hotel in Lumbini.
Lumbini - Birth place of Lord Buddha

sketchProgram.title: Lumbini / Sravasti (in India) (Approx. 240 kms, 6 hrs. drive)
sketchProgram.desc:
After breakfast proceed to Sravasti. Entering in India again. On arrival sightseeing of Sravasti and transfer to Hotel. Overnight at Hotel in Sravasti.
Sravasti - The place of Miracles

sketchProgram.title: Sravasti / Varanasi (Approx. 350 kms, 7-8 hrs. drive)
sketchProgram.desc:
After breakfast proceed to Varanasi (Sarnath). On arrival transfer to Hotel. Overnight at Hotel in Varanasi.
Sarnath - The place of first sermon.

sketchProgram.title: Varanasi / Bodhgaya (Approx. 300 kms, 7 hrs. drive)
sketchProgram.desc:
Morning Boat ride on river Ganges. After Breakfast excursion to Sarnath (12 kms from Varanasi), afternoon proceed to Bodhgaya. On arrival transfer to Hotel. Overnight at Hotel in Bodhgaya.
Bodhgaya - The place of enlightenment.

sketchProgram.title: Bodhgaya out
sketchProgram.desc: Morning sightseeing of Bodhgaya, visiting Maha Bodhi Temple & Monasteries. Afternoon transfer to Airport for onward destinations.
